articles.author: Derek Strickland
articles.title: Microsoft may abandon Activision merger if federal judge grants FTC request - TweakTown
articles.description: Microsoft and Activision have indicated that they may abandon their proposed $68.7 billion merger if federal courts grant FTC a preliminary injunction.
articles.content:
Microsoft legal counsel suggests that the company could abandon the $68.7 billion merger with Activision if federal courts grants the FTC's request for a preliminary injunction.
The fate of the Micr… [+3110 chars]

articles.title: UK clears Amazon's $1.7 billion deal for Roomba-maker iRobot - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's competition regulator on Friday cleared Amazon.com Inc's (AMZN.O) planned $1.7 billion acquisition of iRobot Corp
articles.content:
June 16 (Reuters) - Britain's competition regulator on Friday cleared Amazon.com Inc's (AMZN.O) planned $1.7 billion acquisition of iRobot Corp (IRBT.O), maker of the Roomba vacuum cleaner.

articles.title: Natural Gas, WTI Oil, Brent Oil – Oil Rallies As Traders Bet On Rising China Demand - FX Empire
articles.description: WTI oil managed to settle above the $70 level as traders reacted to China refinery data.
articles.content:
